notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: H.L.M. and A.P. devised the X-ray diffraction experiment, A.I. and A.Z. prepared the BiTeI crystals. H.L.M., K.M., G.C. and J.R.-Z. carried out the X-ray experiments at the ESRF. Data analysis was done by K.M. and H.L.M. The momentum microscopy and XPS experiments at Elettra were carried out by C.T., H.L.M. and Y.J.C. H.L.M., A.I. and C.T. wrote the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the manuscript.
